review: I really like this.  I am actually debating getting free from Comcast Cable TV and Internet.  Go to FIOS on Frontier and cut my bill in half with Sling TV with HBO.  I really only watch HBO and Netfix.  Then I am addicted to some of the CBS shows like GoodWife and Madam Secretary.  Hook up an Amazon antenna for local shows.  They say the downside is not being able to record shows, then bring back your VCR?  Well, if that is a problem then subscribe for an additional 5/month to CBS.  What I liked is the streaming of Netflix.  Through my TV app, it would stop between episodes, this will tee up the next one.  How nice.  The remote is nice and portable.  Now, if I could just program my TV and Audio system to it too, no more extra remotes.
